description:
Add ability to set DNS entries on network create.  

It would also be good to have more than one DNS entry so Primary and Secondary DNS servers can be set.
title: Add ability to set DNS entires on network create

comments.content:
Add ability to set DNS entries on network create.  

It would also be good to have more than one DNS entry so Primary and Secondary DNS servers can be set.
